title: Is We Dumb? | Smoke Detector. Ketchup Packet. Cannon. Heifer Stomp.
description:
WHY IN THE F*@$ ARE KETCHUP PACKETS SO SMALL?! CAN ANYONE TELL US?! Let's talk about that, having your boob stepped on by a cow, one of the worst pieces of furniture ever produced, pushing a bear off a wall to save your dogs, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/wkffgdA5mLc
